name: Pathfinder Software
slogan: The first truly modern intelligent career guidance tool
description:
Career intelligence start-up, Pathfinder, is the first all-in-one, data-driven platform for the entire career development journey. It utilises AI to make career exploration and planning efficient and personalised. We are profoundly different than any other career service currently on the market, as we focus solely on the user and on providing extensive and reliable information that helps the individual find and prepare for the right career path. 

Released in October 2018, the software offers psychometric tests for career suitability, contextual industry data, industry specific news and articles, recommended books and publications, information about industry leaders, suggestions for networking events, classes, skill-building resources, and university degrees. It also provides a database of over 40 million company profiles worldwide, millions of jobs and internships, as well as an inbuilt applications manager, career calendars and to do lists.

team.name: Laura Bengescu
team.bioHtml: @Pathfinder Software Worked @PushMe @Onfido @MathWorks Studied @University of Oxford

team.title: Student ambassador at UCL
team.name: Sunny Yang
team.bioHtml: BSc Biochemistry penultimate year student at UCL. Seeking for opportunities in various fields to apply the skills and knowledge gained from degree.

team.title: Chief Data Scientist
team.name: Eemeli Erkkola
team.bioHtml: Physics graduate from University of Warwick, working as a Lead Data Scientist.

jobs.title: Commercial Director
jobs.description:
Pathfinder is a digital one-stop-shop for career development and planning, aimed at university students worldwide. Our platform offers an ecosystem of useful tools that students can use throughout their university years to find their purpose, to understand the marketplace and its requirements and to prepare adequately to enter the job market. We are not a recruitment platform whatsoever; our focus is 100% on helping students gain awareness and in turn, have confidence in their career-related decisions. 

Cambridge Graduate Kim Aviv founded pathfinder, later joined by Laura Bengescu as CTO (an incredible whizzkid) and has received a sponsorship from Microsoft. Initially thought to be a B2C subscription product, the company pivoted to a B2B2C subscription model. We are looking to work with affiliates and partners, sell to universities in the UK and abroad, and are also speaking with several governmental institutions about collaborations. 

Pathfinder is looking for a Commercial Director to identify, plan, and execute commercial, revenue-generating strategies including but not limited to sales, marketing, and business development and growth channels. The role will entail communication with various stakeholders, as well as research, analytics, preparation of materials and content, outreach, and much more. Our product is very different from what’s on the market currently, so it’s all about trial and error and getting shit done the best way possible and quickly. 

Team
We are a highly ambitious and high-achieving team of 4 people. The environment in the office is collaborative, fast-paced and highly demanding (also hours wise). An early-stage start-up with unrestrained ambition, we are all fully committed to Pathfinder and its success and are looking for someone who will adopt this company as his own and this role as his mission. 

Required 
Understanding/experience in how marketing channels work (social media, PPC, SEO, analytics, etc.), how to design marketing collateral (presentations, brochures, etc.), and how to build an effective sales funnel all going to be a big plus.
With that said, more than anything we are looking for someone who is *creative *analytical *fearless, shameless and fierce *a real go-getter *hungry to succeed and confident *eloquent and a *fast-learner. We believe that anyone can learn and be anything if they want it enough; what we care about is your ambition to be super successful at what you do. 

Benefits
-    Make your own rules and own your success
-    Work with a great team in a family-like environment 
-    Be a founding member of a revolutionary product and hopefully a *££ billionaire* by the time we're done (we won’t settle for less)
-    Grow your department as we grow as a business
-    Central London Location (W1W)
-     Salary, performance bonuses, equity (contingent on performance)
-    Meet with heads of universities, Government ministers, industry titans, and more

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
Hello!

We are looking for a frontend developer part-time/full-time with experience in React with Redux, responsive designs, and rest APIs.

You will work with our CTO directly who holds a bachelor's degree in computer science and a master's degree in machine learning, both from Oxford University. She has also worked in some of the best companies in the UK before joining Pathfinder. 

Enjoy being part of a vibrant, fast-paced startup, where you will learn and develop quickly.

Please get in touch for more details, we will be requiring code samples as part of the interview process.

Preference will be given to candidates based in the United Kingdom and Romania. 

Thank you.
